stimulusHtml: The use of deep relief carving in the Pyxis of al-Mughira affects the composition in which of the following ways?

features.html: Â© RMN-Grand Palais / Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: It highlights the large amount of negative space.
It reduces the sense of depth behind the imagery.
It emphasizes the volume of the figures, decorative motifs, and text.
It minimizes contrast in tone, light, and shadow.
